Welcome

I'm primarily a mathematician and a data scientist. However I have applied those skills in a number of different fields. I hold PhDs in physics and economics, and I currently work in epidemiology and statistics.

This page has some information about me, my work, publications, interests, and a blog where you can read my thoughts on topics related to science, data, and anything else that takes my fancy.
